text: Paulo kamulongela, “Mulungu kokusuna gweye, gweye ulingile kamba kiwambaza kibakigwe chokaa!23:3 Kiwambaza kibakigwe chokaa nhegulo yake ligo da kumulonga munhu yali kizenzeleganye. Kukala aho unilamule nie kamba Malagizo ga Musa vugalonga, ila gweye mwenyego kogabemenda Malagizo ga Musa mkuwashulutiza wanhu wanitoe nie!”
